sp_rel_widget_clone.payload: c.container { display: -ms-flex; display: -webkit-flex; display: flex; } .overview { width: 100%; padding-top: 10px; } .summary { width: 70%; padding-top: 10px; padding-left: 10px; } .summary-value { padding: 5px; } .panel-override { height: 95%; } .info-table { width: 100%; margin-bottom: 10px; .tbody-class { display: table-row-group; vertical-align: middle; border-color: inherit; td{ padding: 10px 5px 10px 0; width: 33.33% } h5{ margin: 5px 0; } } } .label-column { white-space: nowrap; } .value-column { font-weight: 600; }sp_instancefalseproject-infofalseProject Informationfalsefalsesp_widgetadmin2016-06-01 15:59:229dc92a209f731200598a5bb0657fcfea113Project Informationa614b505db09101018097b38689619fcglobalsp_widget_9dc92a209f731200598a5bb0657fcfeaadmin2019-08-30 19:13:59

sys_update_version.name: sp_rel_widget_clone_12844940dbd1501018097b38689619aa
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_rel_widget_clone"><sp_rel_widget_clone action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><child display_value="Runbook Information">5a844940dbd1501018097b38689619a7</child><cloned>2020-06-04 15:27:32</cloned><last_validated>2020-06-04 15:27:32</last_validated><parent display_value="Project Information">9dc92a209f731200598a5bb0657fcfea</parent><payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><sp_widget><category/><client_script><![CDATA[function() {
  // widget controller
  var c = this;
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css>.container {&#13;
   display: -ms-flex;&#13;
   display: -webkit-flex;&#13;
   display: flex;&#13;
}&#13;
.overview {&#13;
    width: 100%;&#13;
    padding-top: 10px;&#13;
}&#13;
.summary {&#13;
   width: 70%;&#13;
   padding-top: 10px;&#13;
   padding-left: 10px;&#13;
}&#13;
.summary-value {&#13;
  padding: 5px;&#13;
}&#13;
.panel-override {&#13;
  height: 95%;&#13;
}&#13;
.info-table {&#13;
  width: 100%;&#13;
  margin-bottom: 10px;&#13;
  .tbody-class {&#13;
    display: table-row-group;&#13;
    vertical-align: middle;&#13;
    border-color: inherit;&#13;
    td{&#13;
      padding: 10px 5px 10px 0;&#13;
      width: 33.33%&#13;
    }&#13;
    h5{&#13;
      margin: 5px 0;&#13;
    }&#13;
  }&#13;
}&#13;
&#13;
.label-column {&#13;
    white-space: nowrap;&#13;
}&#13;
.value-column {&#13;
  font-weight: 600;&#13;
}</css><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>project-info</id><internal>false</internal><link><![CDATA[function(scope, element, attrs, c) {
	/* Hide Service Portal Header when it is being opened in modal dialog from Investment Portal */
	if(c.data.hide_header) {
		$('.navbar').hide();
		$('.sp-page-loader').hide();
	}
}]]></link><name>Project Information</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function() {
	data.hide_header = $sp.getParameter("hide_header") == 'true' || false;
	var result = (new PmProjectStatusReport()).headerInfoPlain($sp.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id'), $sp.getParameter('sysparm_status_date'), $sp.getParameter('sysparm_report_id'));  
	var naStr = '\xa0';
	//gs.info(new JSON().encode(result));
	if(JSUtil.notNil(result)) {
		for(var attr in result) {
			var val = result[attr];
			if(JSUtil.notNil(val))
				data[attr] = val;
			else
				data[attr] = naStr;
		}
	}
})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-06-01 15:59:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>9dc92a209f731200598a5bb0657fcfea</sys_id><sys_mod_count>113</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Project Information</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Project Portfolio Suite Portal" source="com.snc.pps_portal">a614b505db09101018097b38689619fc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_9dc92a209f731200598a5bb0657fcfea</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-08-30 19:13:59</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<div>
  <div class="overview">
  	<div class="panel panel-{{::c.options.color}} b">
  	 <div class="panel-heading">
      	<div class="panel-title">${Overview}</div>
  	  </div>  
  	  <div class="panel-body"> 
        <table class="info-table"> 
          <tbody class="tbody-class">
           <tr>
             <td>
               <div class="label-column">
                 <h5>${Project  Name}</h5>
               </div>
               <div class="value-column bold">
                 {{data.short_description}}
               </div>
             </td>
             <td>
               <div class="label-column">
                 <h5>${Project Manager}</h5>
               </div>
               <div class="value-column bold">
                 {{data.project_manager_value}}
               </div>
             </td>             
             <td>
               <div class="label-column">
                 <h5>${Portfolio}</h5>
               </div>
               <div class="value-column bold">
                 {{data.portfolio_value}}
               </div>
             </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
              <td>
                <div class="label-column">
                  <h5>${State}</h5>
                </div>
                <div class="value-column bold">
                  {{data.state_value}}
                </div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div class="label-column">
                  <h5>${Phase}</h5>
                </div>
                <div class="value-column bold">
                  {{data.phase}}
                </div>
              </td>
              <td>
               <div class="label-column">
                 <h5>${% Complete}</h5>
               </div>
               <div class="value-column bold">
                 {{data.percent_complete_value}}
               </div>
             </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
              <td>
               <div class="label-column">
                 <h5>${Planned Start Date}</h5>
               </div>
               <div class="value-column bold">
                 {{data.start_date_value}}
               </div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div class="label-column">
                  <h5>${Planned End Date}</h5>
                </div>
                <div class="value-column bold">
                 {{data.end_date_value}}
                </div>
              </td> 
              <td>
               <div class="label-column">
                 <h5 ng-if="!data.project_currency">${Planned Cost}</h5>
                 <h5 ng-if="data.project_currency">${Planned Cost in Project Currency}</h5>
               </div>
               <div class="value-column bold">
                 {{data.planned_cost}}
               </div>
             </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
              <td>
               <div class="label-column">
                 <h5>${Actual Start Date}</h5>
               </div>
               <div class="value-column bold">
                 {{data.work_start_value}}
               </div>
             </td>
              <td>
               <div class="label-column">
                 <h5>${Actual End Date}</h5>
               </div>
               <div class="value-column bold">
                 {{data.work_end_value}}
               </div>
             </td>              
              <td>
               <div class="label-column">
                 <h5 ng-if="!data.project_currency">${Actual Cost}</h5>
                 <h5 ng-if="data.project_currency">${Actual Cost in Project Currency}</h5>
               </div>
               <div class="value-column bold">
                 {{data.work_cost}}
               </div>
             </td>              
            </tr>  
            
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
]]></template></sp_widget></payload><sys_class_name>sp_rel_widget_clone</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-06-04 15:27:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>12844940dbd1501018097b38689619aa</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>5a844940dbd1501018097b38689619a7</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ICENOW" source="x_485045_icenow">312b0f2ddb41901018097b386896199e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ICENOW">312b0f2ddb41901018097b386896199e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_rel_widget_clone_12844940dbd1501018097b38689619aa</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-06-04 15:27:32</sys_updated_on></sp_rel_widget_clone></record_update>
